Ms. Brune, when your firm exercised its challenges for 14 cause and its peremptory challenges, did you believe Catherine 15 Conrad, Juror No. 1, was a suspended lawyer? 16 A. No. 17 Q. Why not? 18 A. During the voir dire we believed that her sworn responses 19 to Judge Pauley's questions ruled that out. 20 Q.
